item.description:
"Can you believe the running club is going to be 3 years old?"
"I know! That's so crazy. I wonder what the party will be like."

Hey you TMIRCE'ers.

"Hi Andy. Can you tell us about the Birthday Party? We hear that it's going to be AWESOME and that we should RSVP."

Well you TMIRCE'ers, you're right about both things. It will be AWESOME and you should RSVP.

"Tell us more!!!"

Ok but pay attention. Your partying future depends on it.

We are having our Annual Birthday Extravaganza at the Courtyard Marriott on Memorial Drive on Friday November 12th at 8:00 pm. That's different than past years when we've done it after our run on Saturday.

"Wow. We're super psyched. But will it cost us anything?"

This will cost $15.00 dollars per person. That of course is our suggested minimum since we are always raising money for the club. You can pay on PAYPAL here or at the door the night of the party. All the money we make goes right back into the club for fun stuff like this.

You'll also get 2 Informal Drink Tickets for Domestic Bottled Beer and House Wine.There will be a fully stocked cash bar and some appetizers too!

"What else do we need to know about this fun time?"

Bring your dance shoes. We have a DJ thats planning on bringing the roof down. And since this is a formal event, dress to impress and come ready to get down.

There's also going to be an incredible raffle with some top shelf prizes. Stay wired in for more details about the prizes so you should RSVP.

"Ok. We're in. How can we pay now if we want?"

You can PAY FOR EVENT here or through the information in the meetup event.

Just bring a receipt of your payment to the door to get your drink tickets.

This is going to be the best party ever!

For Real.

Andy

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: The 3rd Annual TMIRC3 Birthday Extravaganza Party Fun Time!
